name: NYDailyNews
text:
An NYC lawyer whose 2018 racist tirade at a Midtown restaurant went viral was chided in an appeals court decision.

During his outburst, Aaron Schlossberg threatened to call immigration enforcement authorities on workers because they spoke Spanish.

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The number of journalists killed due to their work doubled globally in 2020, according to a watchdog.

At least four reporters were murdered for their reporting in violence-marred Mexico. 

https://t.co/N0SxBaO46v
